fields.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to be reasonably satisfied that the registered co-operative exists?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to ensure the co-operative exists.

fields.label: Does your program include risk-based systems and controls to be reasonably satisfied that the names of the chairman, secretary, or equivalent officer have been provided?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems and controls for ensuring officer names are provided.

fields.label: Does your business collect the full name of the registered co-operative?
Does your business collect the full address of the co-operative's registered office, principal place of operations, or relevant officer's residential address?
Does your business collect the unique identifying number issued to the co-operative upon its registration?
Does your business collect the full names of the chairman, secretary, and treasurer (or equivalent officers)?
Does your business determine whether any other KYC information relating to the co-operative's existence should be collected?
fields.detail-label: Describe the process for determining if additional KYC information is required.

fields.label: Does your business verify the full name of the registered co-operative?
Does your business verify the unique identifying number issued to the co-operative?
Does your business determine whether any other KYC information relating to the registered co-operative should be verified?
fields.detail-label: Describe how you determine if further KYC information requires verification.

fields.label: Does your business verify co-operative information using registers or minutes of meetings maintained by the co-operative?
Does your business verify co-operative information using information provided by the State, Territory or overseas body responsible for registration?
Does your business verify co-operative information using reliable and independent documents relating to the co-operative?
Does your business verify co-operative information using reliable and independent electronic data?
Does your business have systems to respond to discrepancies that arise during the verification of registered co-operative information?
fields.detail-label: Describe the systems and controls used to respond to discrepancies.

groups.title: Part 4.7: Registered Co-operatives
groups.description: Applicable customer identification procedures with respect to registered co-operatives.

groups.title: General Requirements
groups.description: Mandatory risk-based systems and controls to ensure the entity exists and officers are identified.

groups.title: Collection of Information
groups.description: Minimum KYC information to be collected for registered co-operatives.

groups.title: Verification of Information
groups.description: Minimum verification requirements from official registers or independent data.

groups.title: Methods and Discrepancies
groups.description: Acceptable verification sources and procedures for handling data conflicts.
